lessonGuidance: The grid is composed of safe spaces and mines.
Mines are what lose you the game. If you attempt to reveal a tile that contains a mine, it is game over.
The point of the game is to identify all tiles that contain mines by flagging them and revealing all safe tiles.
A flag can be placed on a hidden tile by right-clicking on that tile. Flags should only be placed on tiles that you believe contain a mine.
There is no penalty for misplacing a flag. However, you should only place flags on tiles you are sure are mines.
